name: 悦楽の学園
summary: Amamiya Gakuen, a secret pleasure garden prohibited to men, is the site of a investigator's disappearance. What has happened to her? Her friend Yumi, has sent someone to find out. Inside of the ALL-GIRLS high school, lies a variety of voluptuous leasures. Everyone is indulging in not only lesbian pleasures, but all sorts of other temptations. Yet there lies a horrific secret hidden behind Amamiya Gakuen's walls...
info:
• 开发: シーズウェア
  • 遊戲設計師: 菅野ひろゆき
  • 剧本: 菅野ひろゆき
  • 别名: Love Potion
  • 别名: Etsuraku no Gakuen
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 1994-02-25
